Open Access Articles by License and Year

Source: R/volume.R
oa_by_license.Rd

Open Access Articles by License and Year

oa_by_license()

oa_by_license_plot()

Functions

  • oa_by_license_plot: Plot by License and Year

Examples

oa_by_license()
#> # A tibble: 42 x 3
#> # Groups:   license [6]
#>    license  issued absolute
#>    <fct>     <int>    <int>
#>  1 cc-by      2013     5296
#>  2 cc-by      2014    10513
#>  3 cc-by      2015    14414
#>  4 cc-by      2016    23001
#>  5 cc-by      2017    28995
#>  6 cc-by      2018    38095
#>  7 cc-by      2019    41593
#>  8 cc-by-nc   2013     1580
#>  9 cc-by-nc   2014      463
#> 10 cc-by-nc   2015      889
#> # … with 32 more rows
oa_by_license_plot()
